msg: Kickstarts the unittest harness for gadgets.* JavaScript APIs.
To run JavaScript tests (and JavaScript tests only), run the following command under shindig/features:
Testing reports can be found in shindig/features/target/surefire-reports.
To add JavaScript tests, follow the example of features/core/utiltest.js and name new files "*test.js".
